Basic Task Creation:

  • \"Take out the trash\"
  • Create task \"Take out the trash\".
  • Create a task named \"Take out the trash\".

Setting Reminders:

  • Remind me to \"take out the trash\" on Monday at 8pm.
  • Remind me to \"take out the trash\" at 8pm and nag me.
  • Create task \"take out the trash\" with a reminder tomorrow at 8pm.
  • Create task \"take out the trash\" and remind me in 4 hours.
  • Create task \"take out the trash\" and remind me in 4 hours with nagging.

Setting Start and Due Dates:

  • Create task \"take out the trash\" with a due date of Monday at 8pm.
  • Create task \"take out the trash\" with a start date of November 1st.
  • Create task \"take out the trash\" starting today and due on Monday at 8pm.

Adding Repeating:

  • Create task \"take out the trash\" with a reminder on Monday at 8pm and repeat weekly.
  • Create task \"take out the trash\" starting Monday and repeat every 7 days from due date.
  • Create task \"exercise\" starting in 2 days and repeat every Tuesday and Friday from completion date.
  • Create task \"go to board meeting\" starting July 10 and repeat on the 2nd tuesday of each month.

Specifying Folders, Contexts, and More:

  • Create task \"take out the trash\" in the \"personal\" folder.
  • Create task \"take out the trash\" with the \"home\" context.
  • Create task \"exercise\" with the \"improve health\" goal.
  • Create task \"go to board meeting\" with the \"meetings\" tag.
  • Create task \"exercise\" in the \"personal tasks\" account.

Locations and Location-Based Reminders

  • Create task \"go to board meeting\" located at \"work\".
  • Create task \"take out the trash\" located at \"home\" with a reminder
  • Create task \"take out the trash\" located at \"home\" with a nagging reminder
  • Remind me to \"go to board meeting\" when I arrive at \"work\".
  • Remind me to \"go to board meeting\" when I get to \"work\" and nag me.

Other Attributes:

  • Create task \"go to board meeting\" with medium priority.
  • Create task \"write report\" with active status
  • Create task \"write report\" as a subtask of \"create project proposal\".
  • Create task \"meet with client\" and start the timer.
  • Create task \"take out the trash\" and add a star.
  • Create task \"go to board meeting\" starting on Friday at 8am and show in calendar.
  • Create task \"go to board meeting\" starting on Friday at 8am and add to calendar.

Using Combinations:

  • Create task \"write report\" in the \"work\" folder with top priority and a due date of the 23rd.
  • Create task \"weekly status report\" with the \"work\" context staring on Monday and repeat every week.
  • Create task \"write research paper\" with \"next action\" status with the \"school\" tag and add a star.

Completing a Task:

  • Mark the \"call Jim\" task as complete.
  • Mark task \"call Jim\" complete.
  • Mark \"call Jim\" complete.

Using the Timer:

  • Start the timer for \"meet with client\".
  • Stop the timer for \"meet with client\".

Changing Dates:

  • Postpone task \"write report\" to tomorrow. (This option adjusts all dates (start, due, and reminder) that the task is using.)
  • Change the due date for \"science homework\" to October 23rd.
  • Change start date for task \"board meeting\" to the 15th.
  • Change the reminder for \"take out the trash\" to Monday at 8pm.

Changing the Repeating Pattern:

  • Change the repeat for \"regular status report\" to every 2 weeks.
  • Change the repeat for task \"exercise\" to daily.

Locations and Location-Based Reminders:

  • Change the location for \"board meeting\" to \"building C\".
  • Add a location reminder to task \"board meeting\".
  • Add a location reminder to \"board meeting\" with nagging.
  • Remove the location reminder from task \"board meeting\".

Tags:

  • Add the tag \"household\" to \"take out the trash\".
  • Remove the tag \"personal\" from task \"take out the trash\".

The Star:

  • Add a star to the task \"take out the trash\".
  • Remove the star from \"take out the trash\".

Other Task Attributes:

  • Change the priority for \"write report\" to high.
  • Change the status for \"write report\" to planning.
  • Rename the task \"take out the trash\" to \"put out the garbage\".
  • Change the folder for \"take out the trash\" to "personal".
  • Change the context for the task \"take out the trash\" to \"home\".
  • Change the goal for \"exercise\" to \"improve health\".

Removing Attributes:

  • Change the status for \"write report\" to none.
  • Change the folder for \"write report\" to nothing.
  • Change the repeat for \"take out the trash\" to nothing.

Reading Task Lists:

  • Read all tasks.
  • Read my hotlist.
  • Read due today and tomorrow.
  • Read tasks with \"next action\" status.
  • Read the \"Personal\" folder.
  • Read tasks with the \"Work\" context.
  • Read tasks with the \"Fitness\" goal.
  • Read tasks with the \"Meetings\" tag.
  • Read tasks at the \"Home\" location.
  • Read my \"Custom View\" view.

To cancel the current command:

  • Cancel

To exit voice mode:

  • Exit

Using the Wear OS Add-On:

  • The Wear OS add-on may be purchased in the settings area.
  • To show your default task list: \"OK Google. Start Ultimate To-Do List.\"
